title: Lawn Mower
summaries: The Lawn Mower is a tool that can be purchased from the Golfer for 1 GC. It mows normal and Hallowed grass. Mowed grass has a different texture, reduces enemy spawn chance, prevents tall grass from growing, and changes how balls move in golfing. The Lawn Mower deals a fixed 8 damage to entities only while the player is moving forwards, is not in the air, and is not grappled. When it is used on grass other than normal and hallowed, it only removes weeds and flowers.

statistics.Tooltip:
Mows Pure and Hallowed grass
Mowed grass reduces enemy spawn chance
statistics.Buy: 1 GC
statistics.Sell: 20 SC
